title: Science Learning Design for Integrated Text-Image Comprehension

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: VR simulations provided in a lightweight version optimized for smartphones, structured around integrated text-image learning activities

learning_goals: Learners can interpret complex external representations (text-images) in science domains with 85% or higher accuracy.
Learners can solve information integration problems with over 70% accuracy by applying metacognitive strategies based on the ITPC model.
Learners can creatively produce three or more text-image integrated explanatory materials through project-based assessment.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
